welcomePanel.message-1: Imagine there are %numMissingPeople% missing people, and you need to find one of them.
welcomePanel.message-2: A charity has posted photos of their faces on a website.
welcomePanel.message-3: To find your person by scrolling through the %numMissingPeople% photos, you would on average have to view half of them, i.e. %numPhotosViaExistingSolutions%.
welcomePanel.message-4: However, using the Reunite app, you'll need far fewer photos.
demo-info.open-pictures: Tap here to see the %numMissingPeople% missing people, and choose one (in your head) to look for
demo-info.start-message: When you're ready, start searching for them
comparisonPanel.title: Who's more similar to your person?
comparisonPanel.subtitle: The questions are designed to maximise learning, so don't worry if some faces we show are unlike your person.
match-card.title: Is this your person?
confirm-match-dialog.title: Aid worker contacted
confirm-match-dialog.message: An aid worker will verify the match, then contact you with further information.
no-match-dialog.message: No match was found, your choices will be stored and you will be contacted if a potential match is added to the system.
demo-summary.title: Person found!
demo-summary.message-2: Photos needed to find your person:
demo-summary.message-4: fewer photos used than existing solution
server-error: Error receiving information from the server. Please check the server is running. If the problem persists, contact a system admin.
error-dialog.title: Error
further-info.title: Demo Complete
further-info.message-1: Thanks for trying our demo! If you liked it, please vote for us below!
